content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: sticky_piston
inventory=[{"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "creeper_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 38}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "redstone_ore", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a sticky_piston, I first need to craft slime_ball, which requires breaking a slime_block. Therefore I will move the slime_block from slot 16 to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: sticky_piston
inventory=[{"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "creeper_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 38}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "redstone_ore", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that the slime_block has been broken, I can move the resulting slime_ball to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

TASK: Craft an item of type: sticky_piston
inventory=[{"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "creeper_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 38}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "redstone_ore", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: I need to craft a sticky_piston, which requires a piston and a slime ball. The piston requires planks, iron ingots, cobblestone and redstone. The planks can be crafted from the warped_stem, so I will start by moving the warped_stem from slot 32 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: sticky_piston
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 21}, {"type": "creeper_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 38}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "redstone_ore", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: I have crafted the planks from the warped_stem, but I only need one plank for the piston. Therefore, I will move the extra planks to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: sticky_piston
inventory=[{"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 21}, {"type": "creeper_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 38}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "redstone_ore", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a sticky_piston, I need to first craft a piston, which requires a cobblestone, an iron_ingot, and a redstone. To get a redstone, I need to smelt the redstone_ore at slot 45 into an empty slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 45 to slot 13 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: sticky_piston
inventory=[{"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 21}, {"type": "creeper_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete", "quantity": 41, "index": 38}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]

Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

I have all the required materials except the cobblestone and iron ingot. The slime ball needs to be placed on top of the piston, so I will first move the slime ball into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 4 with quantity 1
